dis: Being an explorer always makes one get to the other side of the Odyssey. Communities like this have helped me learn and grow. Open Source being the legacy, here the treasure begins...
I am a CP enthusiast , solving real life inspired problems which requires an insightful logic to every bit of concept entices me more than anything

A passionate programmer, with a zeal to learn something new everday, I have worked in the fields of Game development and Frontend Web development and now I'm exploring the fascinating realms of Open Source.

I am a passionate AI/ML enthusiast and a full-stack developer who possesses a unique blend of skills and interests, combining a deep fascination with artificial intelligence and machine learning with a strong foundation in full-stack web development.

I'm a passionate competitive programmer with a knack for solving complex algorithmic challenges. With a strong foundation in data structures and algorithms, I thrive in the competitive coding arena, constantly improving my problem-solving skills. I'm dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the world of coding competitions.
An Open Sorcerer and Web Enthusiast who loves diving in technical communities and helping out newbies. We can also play Chess and talk about cats.
